text: Brøttum Church is a cross church built in 1790 in Brøttum village, Ringsaker municipality, Innlandet county. It is in the Brøttum parish, Ringsaker Deanery, Hamar diocese. It is located at Mælumsvegen 2 Road in Brøttum village.(Church Search) Norwegian Mapping Agency The structure is wooden and has 330 seats. The church has baroque furniture, an old altarpiece and pulpit. == External links == * Brøttum Church - The National Antiquarian (Norwegian) * Brøttum Parish records in the Norwegian digital archives ==References== Category:Churches in Ringsaker Category:Churches in Ringsaker Deanery Category:Churches completed in 1790 Category:1790 establishments in Norway
title: Brøttum Church
